Changes
=======

2.0.0 (6 Jun 2016)
------------------

- Support for Python 3

- Documentation on Read The Docs

- Continuous testing using Travis CI

- Code coverage reporting through Coveralls

1.1.0 (7 Nov 2009)
-------------------

- Switched to Sphinx documentation

1.0.0 (3 Dec 2008)
------------------

- Initial Release
